# get_psychopy_pos { #DeToX.get_psychopy_pos }

```python
get_psychopy_pos(win, p, units=None)
```

Convert Tobii ADCS coordinates to PsychoPy coordinates.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                   | Description                                                                                     | Default    |
|--------|------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| win    | psychopy.visual.Window | The PsychoPy window which provides information about units and size.                            | _required_ |
| p      | tuple                  | The Tobii ADCS coordinates to convert.                                                          | _required_ |
| units  | str                    | The units for the PsychoPy coordinates. Default is None, which uses the window's default units. | `None`     |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                         |
|--------|--------|-------------------------------------|
|        | tuple  | The converted PsychoPy coordinates. |

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type       | Description                              |
|--------|------------|------------------------------------------|
|        | ValueError | If the provided units are not supported. |
